dmca.title: [ABUSE] Sub:- copyright violation of the site http://www.keralaescorts.info]
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 10, 2005 8:55 AM
To: sameerpersonal@yahoo.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Sub:- copyright violation of the site
http://www.keralaescorts.info]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Sub:- copyright violation of the site
http://www.keralaescorts.info
Date:         Tue, 10 May 2005 06:47:38 -0700 (PDT)
From:         SAMEER(www.chamadi.com) <sameerpersonal@yahoo.com>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com



Sir,
~   Sub:- copyright violation of the site http://www.keralaescorts.info
~ The above mentioned site hosted on your server has illegaly copied the
design and contents of my site http://www.chamadi.com . They had almost
forwarded the site to my servers and i think it will result in the bandwidth
loss of my hosting.Hoping for a fast action from your side.

~                                 thanking
you

~                                 Sameer
Chamadi

- ------------------------------------------------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Small Business - Try our new resources site!
<http://us.rd.yahoo.com/evt=31637/*http://smallbusiness.yahoo.com/resources/
>

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
